args: Does this describe a specific, new, official action or formal announcement already taken/made by the Trump administration? Answer only "yes" or "no". Rep. Lisa C. McClain (R-Michigan), speaking at a GOP leadership news conference Tuesday, dismissed concerns that... Rep. Lisa C. McClain (R-Michigan), speaking at a GOP leadership news conference Tuesday, dismissed concerns that have been aired at Republican town halls around the country about the U.S. DOGE Service — calling the concerns “orchestrated” and from “hijackers” who are “happy with the bloated status quo.”
